nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF ILEANA NEAR THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS AND HEAVY RAINS SPREADING ONSHORE...
summary:
...CENTER OF ILEANA NEAR THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS AND HEAVY RAINS SPREADING ONSHORE...
 As of 11:00 AM MST Sat Sep 14
 the center of Ileana was located near 25.2, -108.9
 with movement N at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
